s.text: The message to Latino voters and politicians, by the way, is: "Take it or leave it.

My own hunch is that both middle-class blacks and middle-class Latinos are pure Republican timber, waiting to be claimed, if only the GOP can get into gear and mount a campaign less insulting that what the Democrats dish up.
First, she will recommend from time to time that the Federales reopen investigations, or look into this or that problem-just to remind voters that she draws legitimacy from the White House.
To make a judgment about whether the 16 deserve to be pardoned-or just locked up forever-we need to know who did what to whom and whether the sentences were fair or ridiculously heavy.
